name: SnapMagic
headline: AI copilot for electronics design
description: Built by electrical engineers for electrical engineers, SnapMagic removes monotony so that engineers can do their best work. SnapMagic’s electronic component data is used by over 1.5 million engineers across the world’s largest organizations. Its new AI Copilot will change the way that every engineer designs electronics. Join at www.snapmagic.com.
generated_description:
**SnapMagic: Your AI Copilot for Electronics Design**

Founded in 2015 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S15, SnapMagic is on a mission to revolutionize electronics design with its powerful AI tools. Based in San Francisco, this company started with a clear vision: to build a solution by engineers for engineers. It aims to remove the dull, repetitive tasks that typically bog down the design process, freeing up engineers to focus on what they do best—creating innovative electronics.

With over **1.5 million engineers** using their electronic component database—which traces its roots back to SnapEDA—SnapMagic has established itself as a trusted resource in the industry. The latest addition to their lineup, the **AI Copilot**, is designed to transform how engineers approach circuit board design. 

### Key Features of SnapMagic:
- **Intelligent Auto-Completion**: The AI Copilot assists with circuit completion and automates mundane tasks, like adding bypass capacitors, letting users focus on complex design challenges.
- **Natural Language Interaction**: Engineers can “chat” with their circuit designs, providing a conversational interface to streamline their workflow. This means automating entire schematics can be as easy as a couple of keystrokes.
- **Supply Chain Awareness**: Integrated with major distributors, SnapMagic keeps engineers informed about component availability, suggesting alternatives in real-time to prevent design setbacks caused by shortages.
- **Optimization**: Users can analyze their Bill of Materials (BOM) for cost and efficiency, with SnapMagic suggesting alternatives that meet their specifications.

SnapMagic stands out not just by alleviating the monotony of design work but also by facilitating real-time decision-making through dynamic supply chain data. The goal? To create a workspace where engineers can thrive and innovate without administrative distractions.

The company currently operates with a team of **28** employees and continues to pursue partnerships and collaborations that enhance its service delivery. 

If you’re an engineer tired of the tedious aspects of design or just want to see how AI can elevate your workflow, SnapMagic is worth a look. Check them out at [www.snapmagic.com](https://www.snapmagic.com/) and join the future of electronics design today.
